title: Strengthening Teaching Practical Competencies: Mathematics Learning Environment Design to Overcome Pedagogical Noncompliance

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more major types and causes of pedagogical noncompliance.
Instructional designers can develop mathematics learning environments utilizing learner engagement strategies.
Formative assessment data can be analyzed to diagnose learner behavior patterns and propose improvements.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
